title: Difficult script font
content:
I’m caught in the dreaded Cascraft Optifont maelstrom.....this is the script typeface I need...or something pretty close....the answer was its a Castcraft Optifont item, except that just ain’t gonna work.

Any better solutions out there?

Thanks folks!!!

[http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=112793#...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071903/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=112793#msg296655 "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=112793#msg296655")

 [‹ Max Planck Institure | serif + sans serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071903/http:/typophile.com/node/42436 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071903/http:/typophile.com/node/42554 "Go to next forum topic")
author: AfterburnerDecals

comments.content: Other versions I know of are [Brendel’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071903/http:/www.qbf.de/dceng.htm) [Anette](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071903/http:/www.qbf.de/cart/cart.exe?gif=dc.gif/Sdc02777.gif) and NovelFonts (long defunct, but the font can still be found floating about the Web) Zirkon.
Thanks a TON Mike! Life saver!
